item.title: Heather add a quote by Stormie Omartian
item.description: "You are of God, little children, and have overcome them, because He who is in you is greater than he who is in the world." -- Stormie Omartian

item.title: Heather add a quote by Beth Moore
item.description: "God made our souls to long for Him, and we are not fully satisfied without His presence in our lives." -- Beth Moore

item.title: Heather add a quote by Beth Moore
item.description: "Lord, You know me. You know my natural personality is given to fear. You know all my insecurities. You know that I have a need to be loved and to feel significant and to feel affirmed. And Father, I’m not going to ask my family to do that for me today. They may or may not, and if they do, that’s wonderful. But Father, You are my sole satisfaction, and I ask You to satisfy me this morning with Your unfailing love." -- Beth Moore

item.title: Heather add a quote by Rosaria Butterfield
item.description: "There is a core difference between sharing the gospel with the lost and imposing a specific moral standard on the unconverted." -- Rosaria Butterfield

item.title: Heather add a quote by Rosaria Butterfield
item.description: "The Bible makes it clear that reason is not the front door of faith. It takes spiritual eyes to discern spiritual matters. But how do we develop spiritual eyes unless Christians engage the culture with those questions and paradigms of mindfulness out of which spiritual logic flows?" -- Rosaria Butterfield

item.title: Heather add a quote by Rosaria Champagne Butterfield
item.description: "Pride combined with wealth leads to idleness because you falsely feel that God just wants you to have fun; if unchecked, this sin will grow into entertainment-driven lust; if unchecked, this sin will grow into hardness of heart that declares other people’s problems no responsibility or care of your own; if unchecked, we become bold in our sin and feel entitled to live selfish lives fueled by the twin values of our culture: acquiring and achieving." -- Rosaria Champagne Butterfield
